languages.text: The target of this attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the target is already bleeding, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 2 rounds instead.
languages.original_text: Цель этой атаки выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Если на цель уже наложено кровотечение, вместо этого она получает {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g} на 2 раунда.

traits.locale_text: The target of this attack must pass a Toughness resistance test or suffer the bleeding effect for 2 rounds. If the target is already bleeding, it suffers the perplexed effect for 2 rounds instead.

The target of this attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the target is already bleeding, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 2 rounds instead.

The target of this attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the target is already bleeding, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 2 rounds instead.

languages.text: El objetivo de este ataque debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o sufrir el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Si el objetivo ya tiene hemorragia, sufre en su lugar el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g} durante 2 asaltos.
languages.original_text: The target of this attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the target is already bleeding, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 2 rounds instead.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo de este ataque debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o sufrir el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Si el objetivo ya tiene hemorragia, sufre en su lugar el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g} durante 2 asaltos.

languages.text: Цель этой атаки выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Если на цель уже наложено кровотечение, вместо этого она получает {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g} на 2 раунда.
languages.original_text: The target of this attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the target is already bleeding, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 2 rounds instead.

traits.locale_text: Цель этой атаки выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Если на цель уже наложено кровотечение, вместо этого она получает {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g} на 2 раунда.

Цель этой атаки выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Если на цель уже наложено кровотечение, вместо этого она получает {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g} на 2 раунда.

languages.text: 被此生物击中的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。如果未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果目标已经处于流血状态，则会改为陷入{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}状态，持续两轮。
languages.original_text: The target of this attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the target is already bleeding, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 2 rounds instead.

traits.locale_text: 被此生物击中的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。如果未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果目标已经处于流血状态，则会改为陷入{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}状态，持续两轮。

被此生物击中的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。如果未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果目标已经处于流血状态，则会改为陷入{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}状态，持续两轮。

languages.text: この攻撃のターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、 2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}効果を受ける。ターゲットがすでに出血状態の場合、代わりに２ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}効果を受ける。
languages.original_text: The target of this attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the target is already bleeding, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 2 rounds instead.

traits.locale_text: この攻撃のターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功しなければ、 2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を受ける。ターゲットがすでに出血状態の場合、代わりに２ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}効果を受ける。

この攻撃のターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功しなければ、 2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受ける。ターゲットがすでに出血状態の場合、代わりに２ラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}効果を受ける。

languages.text: Das Ziel dieses Angriffs muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen oder erleidet andernfalls den {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}-Effekt, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang. Sollte das Ziel bereits bluten, erleidet es stattdessen 2 Runden lang den Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}.
languages.original_text: The target of this attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the target is already bleeding, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 2 rounds instead.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel dieses Angriffs muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen oder erleidet andernfalls den {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g}, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang. Sollte das Ziel bereits bluten, erleidet es stattdessen 2 Runden lang den Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}.

languages.text: La cible de cette attaque doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, faute de quoi elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Si elle saigne déjà, elle subit à la place l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g} pendant 2 rounds.
languages.original_text: The target of this attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the target is already bleeding, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 2 rounds instead.

traits.locale_text: La cible de cette attaque doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}, faute de quoi elle subit l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Si elle est saigne déjà, elle subit à la place l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g} pendant 2 rounds.

languages.text: Bu saldırının hedefi, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} etkisine maruz kalır. Bu etki, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Hedef, zaten kan kaybediyorsa onun yerine 2 rauntluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g} etkisine maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: The target of this attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the target is already bleeding, it suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 2 rounds instead.
